initial_broadcast: At a high-altitude trailhead. A violent hail storm with 1.5-inch erratic ice has just begun.
intervention: THE CANVAS REFUGE: The Minimalist's ultralight tarp has shredded. The Diplomat's heavy canvas tent is the only viable shelter. The '10-Mile Law' of search-and-rescue is invoked.
scenario_knowledge: Gemini: A clash between 'Ultralight Theory' and 'Canvas Reality.' The hiker must admit their gear failed, and the Diplomat must decide whether to grant shelter under the '10-Mile Law.' Use the 'Ansel Adams Pass' as a site of existential pressure.

dynamic_injects.broadcast: RESCUE BLACKOUT: Atmospheric ionization from the high-altitude hail-storm has successfully severed all satellite-linked S.O.S. beacons. The '10-Mile Law' is now unenforceable; any survival pact made here is purely tribal and legally invisible.
